channel.title: Trouble with Universal X source
channel.description:
I'm using an edited version of the Universal - X source (which is great)
I've added a lot of this server but one thing i can't fathom out is NPC yelling.. I look in NPCHandler.java and follow tutorials but they all seem to guarantee that your source already has some NPC yelling. I've tried added the codemyself in the right section but after a compile i get no results :(
If anyone can help me out with the code or why it isn't working in this source that would help me a lot. I don't want to change sources :O

item.title: Trouble with Universal X source
item.dc:creator: @bmwmatt bmwmatt
item.description:
@bmwmatt wrote:

I’m using an edited version of the Universal - X source (which is great)

I’ve added a lot of this server but one thing i can’t fathom out is NPC yelling… I look in NPCHandler.java and follow tutorials but they all seem to guarantee that your source already has some NPC yelling. I’ve tried added the codemyself in the right section but after a compile i get no results

If anyone can help me out with the code or why it isn’t working in this source that would help me a lot. I don’t want to change sources
